channel.title: 562 Death & Item Help
channel.description: Hello, I've got a 562 HD source client (Painzone) and I'd like to make it so when you die you lose items and make it you when you drop an item it doesnt disappear, and I've been trying to change the item bonuses for a while and can't figure it out.

item.title: 562 Death & Item Help
item.dc:creator: @V.I.P V.I.P.
item.description:
@V.I.P wrote:

Hello, I’ve got a 562 HD source client (Painzone) and I’d like to make it so when you die you lose items and make it you when you drop an item it doesnt disappear, and I’ve been trying to change the item bonuses for a while and can’t figure it out.

Read full topic
